subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joffrey Lupul, Mike Knuble and Simon Gagné each scored twice and Antero Niittymaki made 24 saves for the Philadelphia Flyers in a victory over the Thrashers.
snippet: Joffrey Lupul, Mike Knuble and Simon Gagné each scored twice and Antero Niittymaki made 24 saves for the Philadelphia Flyers in a victory over the Thrashers.
